Baby_Human_DVD1. Chapter 2/6. To_Think

In English

SYNOPSIS

Imagine being thrust into a world where you can&#039;t speak, can barely move and must unravel a maze of sounds and sights in order to survive. This is the world of the baby. 

For the first time, experience the first two years of a child&#039;s life just as they do. This groundbreaking program reveals what only little ones know. What is their most profound need? How do they REALLY see their parents? What does it feel like to struggle to walk or learn to speak?

It&#039;s an incredible journey each of us has taken - but none of us remember. Get a carpet-and-crib-eye view of the baby&#039;s world as they take their first humorous, death-defying, wondrous steps into life.

DOCUMENTAL DATA
